title: Language Education Leadership Development for Transformational Leadership and Job Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Course for Preservice/In-Service Language Teachers Focusing on Applying Transformational Leadership Theory and Job Immersion Strategies to Practical Scenarios

learning_goals: Apply the four core elements of transformational leadership (inspirational motivation, individualized consideration, intellectual stimulation, and idealized influence) to language education settings.
Design and implement informal learning strategies (feedback utilization, peer observation, self-reflection) to enhance job immersion
Develop personalized leadership action plans considering self-efficacy and validate them through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
